short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge content population! AcePaste speeds up copy-pasting from documents to web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you work with content in a CMS, you'll know it involves a lot of dull and time consuming copy-pasting. But with AcePaste running, you can add all the content upfront and quickly paste-paste-paste your way through each item!

You can try out the plugin 15 times for free to see if it suits your needs. Then, a key is required to continue use - this can be purchased through our website, or by clicking the "Purchase key" link from within the extension.

We'd love to hear your feedback in a review! ‚ù§
Thank you for checking out AcePaste!
